properties.areaDesc: North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet/Denver/West Adams and Arapahoe Counties/East Broomfield County; Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet/West Broomfield County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 12:14PM MST until February 11 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Denver CO
properties.description:
...SNOW AND SLIPPERY ROADS EXPECTED TONIGHT...

.An upper level disturbance moving over the state tonight is
expected to produce another round of snow along the Front Range
foothills and adjacent plains. As the snow increases this evening,
snow is expected to begin accumulating on roadways. Light to
moderate snow is expected through about midnight, with lighter
amounts after that.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5
inches.

* WHERE...Boulder and the western suburbs of Denver and Denver.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 2 AM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions may extend through the Tuesday morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM MST TUESDAY
